name: Powered Up Breakfast Crumble
description: This is a cross between a fun fruity dessert and breakfast granola that delivers close to 20 g of protein to fuel your day so you stay strong and keep yourself fuller longer. Use frozen fruit â€“ it keeps the crumble perfectly saucy and is less expensive.

ingredients.name: frozen or fresh mixed berries (blueberries, raspberries, or blackberries)
Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix or Berry Swirl No-Bake Cheesecake Mix
Power Up Vanilla Protein Blend or Power Up Chocolate Protein Blend

preparation: In Multipurpose Steamer, toss berries with sweet dip and lemon juice.
Microwave uncovered, on high, for 4 min, or until berries become tender and sauce begins to thicken.
Meanwhile, in a bowl, stir together oats, protein blend, spice, butter, and nuts if desired.
Spoon the mixture over warm berries; microwave 4 min or until hot. Serve with Greek yogurt.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.
